QuestData.Title: All An Aspirant Can Do
QuestData.Description:
I think we can agree that such a reply feels... somewhat hollow.
I choose to take faith that we have done all we can. All of us. I do not know what comes next, but perhaps the path will reveal itself. In the meantime, Pelagos and I will return to Aspirant's Rest for a moment of respite.
We will meet you there, though there is no need to hurry.
QuestData.RewardText:
<Kleia smiles warmly at you.>
Does this mean you intend to stay?
